Welcome to Loop Controller and Remote I/O’s documentation!¶

Shift Register Class¶

class shift_object.shiftregister(store, enable, shift, data, outputs)¶
__init__(store, enable, shift, data, outputs) → None¶

__init__ initializes the shift register object.

Parameters

  • store (DigitalInOut) – Storage Register clock pin

  • enable (DigitalInOut) – OE pin

  • shift (DigitalInOut) – Shift Register clock pin

  • data (DigitalInOut) – Data Pin

  • outputs (Integer) – Number of outputs (8 or 16)

disable() → None¶
enable() → None¶
update(new_data) → None¶
